author: github.com/ddoapps
description: Npm scripts for starting a local server for file usage
name: ddoapps.data

scripts.install-at-work: npm config set strict-ssl false && npm run-script install-all && npm config set strict-ssl true
scripts.update-all-at-work: npm config set strict-ssl false && npm run-script update-all && npm config set strict-ssl true
scripts.update-at-work: npm config set strict-ssl false && npm update && npm config set strict-ssl true
